imdb.title: Raja, Rasoi Aur Andaaz Anokha
plot: Hosted by chef Ranveer Brar, the show takes you to his retreat - an old world bungalow basking in the laid back vibe of Goa and then along on a ride nostalgia and rediscovery; both personal and culinary.
